zh: 上櫃公司資本額、已上櫃股數、稅前純益、稅後純益、最近一年度及當年度股利與股配、本年股東會日期。
上/興櫃公司現金增資、新上櫃公司初次公開承銷、上/興櫃公司新發行上櫃公司債、上櫃公司產業別募集資金明細、上/興櫃公司實際募集資金情形明細表。
上/興櫃公司前一個月之營業額及背書保證金額，並與前一年度同期比較。
證券櫃檯買賣中心 版權所有©1994-2023  10084台北市中正區羅斯福路二段100號15樓
本站建議最佳瀏覽條件：螢幕解析度 1024x768 以上，瀏覽器為 Chrome、Safari、Edge、FireFox。
en: Share capital, number of listed shares, net profit before tax, net profit after tax, dividend and distribution in latest year and current year, and date of shareholders meeting in current year for a TPEx listed company.

Cash capital increase by TPEx Regular/Emerging listed company, first public offering by new TPEx listed company, new TPEx listed corporate bonds issued by TPEx Regular/Emerging listed company, details of funds raised by sector by TPEx listed company, and details of actual funds raised by TPEx Regular/Emerging listed company.
Sales revenue, endorsements, and guarantees in previous month for TPEx Regular/Emerging listed company and compared to the figures for the same period last year.
Tel: +886-2-23699555, Emerging Stock Trading Hotline: +886-2-2366-6102, Investor Hotline: +886-2-23666100
